The [S]treet.desc:
You stand in front of Hotel Pyramide, an Egyptian styled
boutique hotel. There is a Hacker Conference going on at the hotel.
The [S]treet.action_str1: Hahaha, you are trying to talk to a hotel!
The [S]treet.open_acl_msg: No no no, you can't leave this hotel. You are locked in forever.

The [H]otel Lobby.desc: You are in the lobby of our beautiful hotel "The Pyramid". Here you can find our reception, the hotel bar and a shop. On your right you can find the elevator to all the rooms and on the left is of course the entrance through which you came in.

The [E]levator.desc: The elevator will take you to any floor you like
The [E]levator.action_acl_msg: You don't have a VIP keycard, access denied
The [E]levator.state_desc: VIP access to second floor granted.
The [E]levator.action_msg: VIP access to second floor granted.

The [F]irst Floor.desc: This the hallway on the First Floor
The [F]irst Floor.open_acl_msg: Access to this floor is for hotel guests only!

The [S]econd Floor.desc: This is the hallway on the Second Floor
The [S]econd Floor.open_acl_msg: This floor is for VIP guests only!

[K]eycard.desc: This looks like a VIP keycard
[K]eycard.action_msg: You succesfully copied the VIP keycard

Keycard-[C]opy.desc: A copy of the VIP keycard

[P]roxmark III.desc: The Proxmark is an RFID swiss-army tool, allowing for both high and low level interactions with the vast majority of RFID tags and systems world-wide.
[P]roxmark III.action_acl_msg: You need some money to buy the Proxmark III

The [R]eceptionist.action_acl_msg: I'm sorry sir, I'm only allowed to check out VIP guests.
The [R]eceptionist.action_str1: Here you go Sir, everything is settled.
The [R]eceptionist.state_desc: You are now allowed to leave the hotel

[A]TM machine.desc: Hey, the ATM is hacked and gives out free $100 bills
[A]TM machine.action_msg: You have withdrawn $100 and put it in your wallet
[A]TM machine.action_acl_msg: Please play fair and don't use the ATM so often!

The [D]ungeon.desc:
It is dark in here, get into a dark area so your eyes will adjust to the light...
...or you will not see anything

[T]unnel.action_acl_msg: You can only enter after proving yourself worthy. And gifts will go a long way!
